topic.title: Fight the COVID-19 together!
topic.body:
Let us fight the covid-19/coronavirus with your computer(s)
https://foldingathome.org

topic.title: Does anyone else use coinimp?
topic.body: I'm testing coinimp on  http://127.0.0.1:43110/15jdaCXQndwB7rJqtGVVjr71Sr1TPVoTjX/, but it doesn't work well...

1585616782_1BpmfrtYDwDy6ERRr8jLb5mavzRuT.body:
let's fight the covid-19 with your computer(s)!
this project is covid-19's protein researching.
I hope to help this research.
If you join Team 256121, you can be zeronet unofficial team.
Thank you.

> [speedbroken](#comment_39_1B5o3toxJWGnTZLHCXf6cfvaFeeC1WLqMh): If only a fraction of bitcoin miners join this project...

this project can choose "Only when idle" option, so you can run it when you are doing something.
If you feel folding at home is Unreliable, you can join rosetta at home(it is BOINC project).

> [twaughthammer](#comment_4_19wST3xx2aLK2AfzZhgQ9xWQMJ2RsfQoUP): What? You like wasting your time and electricity? I'll pass... It's an artificial hybrid Flu, developed by some Chinese scientists and funded by the US government.

wait, can I ask that more detail?
However, I don't live in either country.
I will continue this project because I cannot believe they are friends.

1586981807_145UdHkipHkyVRvbjGSB8CLGt9Jwz.body: I'm fine, thank you. And you?

1588406337_1Fjz1g7unEcMnTRy7nc9WUBZdA7eH.body:
https://srad.jp/story/17/11/07/0838216/ (This is Japanese article) said that GOOGLE couldn't disable them.
I think you should think ME minix is installed in your CPU(s).

1605183010_1BpmfrtYDwDy6ERRr8jLb5mavzRuT.body: I'm not sure if I can fix it.

1626930815_1BpmfrtYDwDy6ERRr8jLb5mavzRuT.body:
> [xcape2net](#comment_908_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac2kfnz): How is that for surfing the Internet?  What every day computing tasks does the Raspberry Pi 4B have difficulty with?

very good for surfing internet. however, if you want to watching youtube with many tabs , you may got some difficulties XD
